name: my-azure-storage
description: # Blob https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/blobs/storage-blobs-introduction A container organizes a set of blobs, similar to a directory in a file system. A storage account can include an unlimited number of containers, and a container can store an unlimited number of blobs. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29280957/208163999-90c2449e-d13f-40af-8184-0a8ec0be09e4.png)
